title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-6.3 - Accruals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-6.3 - Accruals

State Regulations

At the end of each reporting period, a journal voucher
shall be prepared charging the respective operating expense accounts and
crediting the appropriate accrued accounts with the total of all accrued
expenses. Items included in this category shall be expenses that have been
incurred but for which payment is not due, such as electricity, gas, water, salaries, wages, etc. If the precise amount of the expense incurred with
respect to these items cannot be determined, an estimate shall be made. This
estimate may be made on the basis of meter readings, previous bills or
payrolls. On the first day of the subsequent month this journal entry shall be
reversed. Notes
